description: Detects uninstallation or termination of security products using the WMIC utility
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential Tampering With Security Products Via WMIC
query: ((((process.command_line.text:"*wmic*" AND process.command_line.text:"*product\ where\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*call*" AND process.command_line.text:"*uninstall*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\/nointeractive*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*wmic*" AND process.command_line.text:"*caption\ like\ *" AND process.command_line.text:("*call\ delete*" OR "*call\ terminate*"))) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*process\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*where\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*delete*"))) AND process.command_line.text:("*%carbon%*" OR "*%cylance%*" OR "*%endpoint%*" OR "*%eset%*" OR "*%malware%*" OR "*%Sophos%*" OR "*%symantec%*" OR "*Antivirus*" OR "*AVG\ *" OR "*Carbon\ Black*" OR "*CarbonBlack*" OR "*Cb\ Defense\ Sensor\ 64\-bit*" OR "*Crowdstrike\ Sensor*" OR "*Cylance\ *" OR "*Dell\ Threat\ Defense*" OR "*DLP\ Endpoint*" OR "*Endpoint\ Detection*" OR "*Endpoint\ Protection*" OR "*Endpoint\ Security*" OR "*Endpoint\ Sensor*" OR "*ESET\ File\ Security*" OR "*LogRhythm\ System\ Monitor\ Service*" OR "*Malwarebytes*" OR "*McAfee\ Agent*" OR "*Microsoft\ Security\ Client*" OR "*Sophos\ Anti\-Virus*" OR "*Sophos\ AutoUpdate*" OR "*Sophos\ Credential\ Store*" OR "*Sophos\ Management\ Console*" OR "*Sophos\ Management\ Database*" OR "*Sophos\ Management\ Server*" OR "*Sophos\ Remote\ Management\ System*" OR "*Sophos\ Update\ Manager*" OR "*Threat\ Protection*" OR "*VirusScan*" OR "*Webroot\ SecureAnywhere*" OR "*Windows\ Defender*"))
